articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Apple’s next iPhone SE might get an OLED upgrade - The Verge
articles.description: The iPhone SE may get an OLED screen, as Apple is reportedly placing orders with Asian suppliers for the fourth-generation version of its budget phone.
articles.content:
Apples next iPhone SE might get an OLED upgrade
Apples next iPhone SE might get an OLED upgrade
